Name: LambdaLang
Description: A modern functional language designed for concurrent and distributed programming. It emphasizes syntactic simplicity and native actor-based concurrency.
Creator: Dr. Sarah Nilsson

Name: Python
Description: A high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and broad applicability in web development, data science, AI, and more.
Creator: Guido van Rossum

Name: C
Description: A low-level, general-purpose programming language that has influenced many modern languages and is widely used for system programming.
Creator: Dennis Ritchie

Name: JavaScript
Description: A lightweight, interpreted scripting language commonly used for dynamic content in web development.

Name: Rust
Description: A systems programming language focused on safety and concurrency, known for its memory safety guarantees without a garbage collector.
Creator: Graydon Hoare

Name: Swift
Description: A modern programming language developed by Apple for iOS and macOS development, known for its safety and performance.
Creator: Chris Lattner

Name: PHP
Description: A server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language.
Creator: Rasmus Lerdorf

Name: TypeScript
Description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and is designed for large-scale application development.
Creator: Anders Hejlsberg

Name: Scala
Description: A hybrid functional and object-oriented programming language that runs on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM).
Creator: Martin Odersky

Name: Elixir
Description: A functional, concurrent language built on the Erlang VM, known for its scalability and maintainability.
Creator: Jos√© Valim

Name: Julia
Description: A high-level, high-performance programming language for technical computing, with syntax similar to Python and MATLAB.
Creator: Jeff Bezanson

Name: Perl
Description: A high-level, interpreted language known for its text processing capabilities and flexibility in web development.
Creator: Larry Wall

Name: SQL
Description: A domain-specific language used in programming and managing relational databases, known for its declarative syntax.
Creator: Donald D. Chamberlin

Name: SwiftUI
Description: A declarative framework for building user interfaces across all Apple platforms, using Swift.
Creator: Chris Lattner

Name: GoLang
Description: A statically typed, compiled language designed for simplicity and efficiency in system programming and web services.
Creator: Robert Griesemer

Name: Crystal
Description: A programming language that aims to combine the performance of C with the syntax of Ruby, designed for efficiency and concurrency.
Creator: Ary Borenszweig

Name: C++
Description: An extension of the C programming language that includes object-oriented features, widely used for system and application software development.
Creator: Bjarne Stroustrup

Name: Visual Basic
Description: An event-driven programming language from Microsoft known for its ease of use in developing Windows applications.
Creator: Alan Cooper
